template<class Conf> \
    struct rand_nolimited<type,Conf>{\
        static type rand(void) {return (type)(gen_alg);}\
    };\
    template<int min, int max>\
    struct rand_limited<type,min,max>{\
        static type rand(void) {return (type)(lim_gen_alg);}\
